fields.label: Page Header
fields.name: page_header
fields.instructions: Please select the type of header this page will use. If "Page Content" is selected, the featured image will be displayed at the top of the page, with the page title and content centered beneath it. If "Slideshow" is selected, you will be able to create that content below. The featured image, page title, and content will not be used.
